Interface IReportGeneration

public interface IReportGeneration
Interface for generating reports in the BTO Management System.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    exportReport(Report report, String filePath)
    Exports a report to a file.

    Generates a report of all booked flats filtered by marital status.

  • Method Details

    • generateBookingReceipt

      Receipt generateBookingReceipt(Application application)
      Generates a receipt for a flat booking.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      The generated receipt

    • generateProjectBookingReport

      Report generateProjectBookingReport(Project project)
      Generates a report of all booked flats for a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to generate a report for
      Returns:
      The generated report

    • generateMaritalStatusReport

      Report generateMaritalStatusReport(Project project, String maritalStatus)
      Generates a report of all booked flats filtered by marital status.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to generate a report for
      maritalStatus - The marital status to filter by ("Single" or "Married")
      Returns:
      The generated report

    • generateFlatTypeReport

      Report generateFlatTypeReport(Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Generates a report of all booked flats filtered by flat type.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to generate a report for
      flatType - The flat type to filter by
      Returns:
      The generated report

    • generateAgeRangeReport

      Report generateAgeRangeReport(Project project, int minAge, int maxAge)
      Generates a report of all booked flats filtered by age range.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to generate a report for
      minAge - The minimum age to include
      maxAge - The maximum age to include
      Returns:
      The generated report

    • getProjectReports

      List<Report> getProjectReports(Project project)
      Gets a list of all reports for a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to get reports for
      Returns:
      A list of all reports for the specified project

    • getReportById

      Report getReportById(String reportId)
      Gets a report by ID.
      Parameters:
      reportId - The ID of the report to retrieve
      Returns:
      The report with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • exportReport

      boolean exportReport(Report report, String filePath)
      Exports a report to a file.
      Parameters:
      report - The report to export
      filePath - The path to export the report to
      Returns:
      true if the report was successfully exported, false otherwise
